description:
Qian Yunxi, the eldest daughter of the Grand Councilor, has had supernatural powers since she was young. Because of this, she has been kept in the Spirit-Cloud Mountain as she is seen as an ominous girl. When she`s 16, she finds herself substituted for her younger sister into a marriage with Prince of Ye. However, it is said that the Prince of Ye is cold, eccentric, and cruel.
Source: crunchyroll

REGULAR.description:
The emperor arranges the marriage between the daughter of Grand Councilor and Prince of Ye. Qian Yunxi as a substitute for her younger sister Qian Yunshang marries to Prince of Ye. However, she was sent to Serenity Pavilion, a haunted place by her groom on the wedding night.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: You think you deserve to be my princess?

REGULAR.description:
While Yunxi swings in the palace didn`t expect to attract the Prince of Yu, Yu Zimo. After pretended to be a maid and escape from him, Yunxi met Succubus, the horse of Prince of Ye. Her life as a princess begins to be colorful. But Yunxi disguised herself as a man and left Princely Palace of Ye because of dreams that the Auntie Xue and Queer were abused.
Source: crunchyroll

On the way back to the House of Grand Councilor, Yunxi encountered Nan Qingwan, whose purse was stolen. Yunxi volunteered to help her catch the thief, but during the fight with the thief, she uses psychedelic smoke. The Prince of Ye from the ferry boat saw the smoke and thought of the "assassin" he met on the wedding night.
Source: crunchyroll

Yunxi was invited into the Drunk Fairy by the boss Ruoyan, but she misunderstanding the relationship between lady Ruoyan and the crown prince Jun Yiqing. While Yunxi losing the fight with the guards, Prince of Ye saves her. Also, the Prince of Yu recognized Yunxi, because her dress up was removed by accident. The scene was in chaos.
Source: crunchyroll

Qian Yunxi, who was brought back to the palace by Yu Zimo, was robbed by Jun Yiqing. The jade pendant lost in his palace made Yu Zimo mistaken Prince of Ye as the robbers. On the other side, Prince of Ye, who secretly planning to against the Grand Councilor, has mixed feelings about Yunxi. At this time, Yunxi found that her father didn`t keep his word.
Source: crunchyroll

Yunxi met the maid Que`er again when she sneaked back to the house of Grand Councilor and she learned that Auntie Xue was driven out by her stepmother. With the information from his secret agent, Ye Youming wonders Yunxi was a spy sent by the Grand Councilor, so he decided to go to the house of Grand Councilor to figure out.
Source: crunchyroll

After the identity was revealed, Yunxi quarreled with the family because they did not keep their promises. The angry Qian Aotian wanted to punish this unfilial daughter. It happened that the Prince of Ye arrived to stop it. With this opportunity, Yunxi wants to take Que`er and Auntie Xue with her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Domineering Prince of Ye, save his wife online

REGULAR.description:
Beauty Chu, the concubine most loved by Prince of Ye, was provoked by other concubines and looking for troubles of Yunxi but was easily resolved. At this time, Prince of Ye passed by and was drawn by Beauty Chu to be the arbitrator.
Source: crunchyroll

After Yunxi was released from the shed, Ye Yunming took her to Princess Lanshuang`s birthday party. During the party, Lord Beitang Lie from Western Tribe presents precious gifts to Princess Lanshuang in order to request peace.
Source: crunchyroll

The birthday party becomes a discussion of the business relationship between the two countries, and the winner of the horse racing will have the initiative to negotiate. But a sudden rainstorm not only destroyed the horse racing, but also the Coming-of-age ceremony of the Princess Lanshuang.
Source: crunchyroll

Qian Yunxi and Ye Youming set up a shelter together from the rain, and the banquet was able to continue. After the banquet, Grand Councilor told Yunxi that Auntie Xue had found, and she has to behave herself if she wants Auntie Xue unharmed, she wouldn`t make a fuss anymore. Qian Yunxi was very angry but obediently agreed.
Source: crunchyroll

Prince of Ye asked Yunxi to be responsible for all daily matters of the Hall of Esteemed Virtue and serving him, starting from today. Is it a promotion for her?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Promotion of the Princess of Ye

REGULAR.description:
In order to find the ring Mochi mentioned. Yuni can`t avoid physical contact with Prince of Ye. He took the advantage and kissed her. At the same time, Prince of Ye found that the Grand Councilor was cheating on the Emperor and the true identity of Yunxi.
Source: crunchyroll

Ye Youming came to the Serenity Pavilion to have a showdown with Qian Yunxi. She has to go to the hall of Esteemed Virtue every day and serve him willingly. In order to get rid of the daily service, Yunxi tries to smash everything, but Ye Youming had already seen through her tricks.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A smile can melt your heart

REGULAR.description:
During the fight with the demon, a ring suddenly appeared and release huge energy to defeat the demon. After healed by Grandpa Ginkgo, Prince of Ye found out he can saw the monster now.
Source: crunchyroll

Beauty Chu invites Taoist master Meihai, to clean-up all the evil in the Palace. Master Meihai want to take Yunxi as his apprentice when he found Yunxi`s talent. But Prince of Ye shown up and stopped him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: You think you deserve to end this?
